name: Count Masters
description:
crowd warriors together to clash with the opposing crowd. You have a chance to get absorbed in the bright world of Count Masters full of gang fights and stick man battles. Get ready to spend hours playing one of the most thrilling running games. We promise: you won’t get bored! Be a part of colors to end up large rush to reach the finish line and join conflict on this count masters crowds clashed game. Be a part of color to fight your war within the fort. Run and evade over every impediment and enemy on your difficult journey. Become the biggest crowd in City! Gather people across the city and crush your opponents with your overwhelming leadership! Multiple levels with increasing difficulty. You’ll face a lot of challenges, but don’t worry: you have your stick man crowd to clash with the bitterest enemies.

Choose the best gate, pass through it, and bring stick man warriors together to clash with the opposing crowd. Become the crowd master and lead your people through the crowded city till the end of this epic race. Crash obstacles and beat everyone on your way, collect coins and upgrade your levels.
